descriptionParagraphs.name: Short description
content: Complement your Learning Pathways content with live expert sessions and bitesize video!

descriptionParagraphs.name: Long description
content: A complete suite of complementary digital and in person learning and support for Microsoft 365. Our range of tools can be used to further the reach and efficacy of Learning Pathways to ensure adoption and drive productivity.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content: In many organisations, Microsoft 365 adoption can be hampered by misunderstandings and a lack of support for users. The first step in the correct use of Microsoft 365 is to gain a healthy understanding of the ‘why’ and how it will benefit you. Only then can you begin to understand the ‘how’.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content:
Designed and developed by our team of experts, the YourKnowHow video portfolio contains over 250 videos covering all the day to day topics users need to understand to effectively use Microsoft 365. What’s even better is that our library is updated on a monthly basis, ensuring users learn the most up to date content in an environment they are familiar with.
  • Over 250 Microsoft 365 Videos
  • Developed by our Team of Experts
  • 2-4 Minute easy to consume bite-sized content
  • Fully narrated
  • Full HD with Captions
  • Simple deployment, Azure, Stream, SCORM Compliant
  • Monthly content updates in line with Microsoft 365
  • Custom video development available

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content: Driving your organization forward to achieve true digital transformation, providing just in time, up to date help and support to your users.
